column1: JINYA Ramen Bar - Houston////My gal and I go almost once or twice a week. I truly love this place
column2: the wait staff gives you space to enjoy your evening. If you have tried their vegan ramen please try...You do NOT have to be a vegan to enjoy their Vegan ramen ! Please try..super creamy broth
column3: tofu fried shallot garlic onions! Do yourself a favor and go to Jinya Â friends
